skmultiflow.options.base_option module¶

class skmultiflow.options.base_option.BaseOption[source]¶

Bases: skmultiflow.core.base_object.BaseObject

The abstract class that defines the constraints for all option classes in this framework.

Raises:NotImplementedError: This is an abstract class.

skmultiflow.options.file_option module¶

class skmultiflow.options.file_option.FileOption(option_type=None, option_name=None, option_value=None, file_extension=None, is_out=False)[source]¶

Bases: skmultiflow.options.base_option.BaseOption

This class keeps information about a file.

Parameters:
  • option_type (string) – The type of file related to the option. Can be anything.
  • option_name (string) – The option identification. Can be anything.
  • option_value (string) – The complete path to the file.
  • file_extension (string) – The type of extension.
  • is_out (bool) – Whether it’s an output file or not.
